clinical_history: Patient with history of known malignancy referred for staging PET-CT.
findings: Hypermetabolic lymph nodes noted in adrenal gland, suggestive of malignancy.
Diffuse uptake in thyroid gland, differential includes thyroiditis or nodular disease.
Diffuse mild increased uptake in liver, likely benign.
Physiologic brown fat uptake in supraclavicular region.
No abnormal activity in lungs or mediastinum.
Focal increased uptake in adrenal gland, recommend further correlation with CT morphology.
recommendations: Correlate with MRI/CT for precise anatomical localization.
